website_summaries.verdict: A feature-packed option that will entertain for hours.
pros: Features advanced technology that sees and follows movements
Senses touch and responds in a convincing manner
Comes with interactive toy and sings, dances, and performs tricks
cons: Hard exterior may make convincing cuddling a bit more difficult

customer_reviews.title: It is cute it keeps her busy and i would recommend buying it just dont expect it to stay charged ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves it from the moment she opened it but the fact that you charge it for 1 hr only for it to run 20 to 30 minutes each time is my only problem. It is cute it keeps her busy and i would recommend buying it just dont expect it to stay charged long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zoomer Kitty was cute...while she lasted ... which was all of about 7 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Zoomer Kitty was cute...while she lasted ... which was all of about 7 minutes. Pretty sure it ended up just being a bad charging cable but we didnt figure that out before the end of the 7 yr olds birthday party. Amazon was awesome (as usual) and had a new Kitty sent overnight.
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: A birthday present for the daughter of my best friend. She really loves it
customer_reviews.text: A birthday present for the daughter of my best friend. She really loves it. The first one I bought quit working on the second day, but this one is working much better.
customer_reviews.author: JB 007

customer_reviews.title: Cute Enough
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be an early purchased Christmas gift. Took it out and tested it to make sure everything worked. Operation is a little confusing when it comes to the different modes but I guess it would be easier with more time spent playing with it. The collar that comes with it is a BEAR to put around this things neck! I guess that's why there's two so a child can wear one as a bracelet, they know you're not gonna want to have to put it on ever again.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Teasley

customer_reviews.title: The idea and the cat is nice when it works but they should have done some ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a disaster. It will 100% break down (more) sooner than later and you will have to just explain your kid why the cat died after a couple of months. If you are unlucky or lucky enough that it broke down in the first months then you can ask for a replacment which will then break down anyway, so you are basically postponing the inevitable. The idea and the cat is nice when it works but they should have done some real testing or not use garbage materials before going into prduction
customer_reviews.author: PPP

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I love cats but my allergies are too bad for one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. She takes her zoomer kitty everywhere. My daughter and I love cats but my allergies are too bad for one, this cat made up for it. Parents buy this for your kids. Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracks in the tail
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 4 stars as it preformed wonderfully. Bella, the Zoomer Kitty did everything as promised, purring when her ears were rubbed, playful and pouncing, everything. The tail had cracks causing it to list to one side so unfortunately I returned it. It would have been the perfect Birthday present for my Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hart

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider before you buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a "Meh" toy, two stars because of the price. does what it says but my daughter played with it 5 times before she got bored.
customer_reviews.author: Crescendo

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fairly Well
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well..Touch scensors were pretty much broken,but the battery lasted a while, and didn't need frequent charging.It was an overall little toy.
customer_reviews.author: His Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great eyes and realistic sounding
customer_reviews.text: Cute kitty/buttons worked well/good natural meow...goes forward, lunges forward and adjusts around furniture. Hand motion functions did not work well. Requires charging often.felt it was a little costly for functions. . Purchased as gift for 5 yr old, maybe suits older age better.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy that my 6 year old daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: I bought a robo Kitty that's pink, expected to receive that and that's exactly what I got. it does robo Kitty things. Really what's more to be expected of it.
customer_reviews.author: BowtieWill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gave it to an underprivileged child from Santa, never has a toy been so loved
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for Grandparents !!
customer_reviews.text: Provides hours of fun for my Grandkids and takes a beating from rough play as well. Noticed that the tail removes easily but goes right back on with little effort. Requires some adult reading to program the right mode for the numerous functions the toy is capable of performing. Granddaughter insisted to take it to preschool to show her friends her new "pet" !!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ostlie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't give 5 stars because this kitty came without the ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't give 5 stars because this kitty came without the collar and matching bracelet. No time to return before Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: It is loud and can get annoying but I just ignore it

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked how much this thing was for what it does. Not impressed. My 8 year old daughter liked it for a few minutes but it gets boring pretty fast. I would not waste almost 100.00 on something like this again. Its also annoying you have to keep plugging it in to charge on the computer because its doesn't come with its own plug in charger.

customer_reviews.title: But she is going to love it!
customer_reviews.text: On time for Christmas! Haven't gotten it to my Granddaughter yet! But she is going to love it!

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...its a pricey toy, and not much else- BUT good company and would buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: Company did a great job on delivery so they get 5 stars! The toy itself gets 3 stars because... My daughter REALLY wanted this. I couldn't get out of it. It needs to be charged by a cord. Watched it move on the floor and couldn't get a feel for what I was supposed to be seeing. Moving style is sort of bouncy/jerky and doesn't really travel across the floor. Confusing to watch, entertainment value is questionable. Battery life is a little short, had to charge it three times in one day, so I discouraged its use. Pricey for the payoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She was sad and dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. I bought for grand daughters birthday. It worked for a few days, then quit working. I had to return it. Maybe it was a lemon. She was sad and dissapointed.

product_meta.title: Zoomer Kitty - Pink Bella With Kitty Collar
product_meta.description: Bring home your PURRfect friend with Zoomer Kitty Bella. She's the sweetest interactive pet who loves to play, pounce and purr just like a real Kitty. Using True Vision Technology, she actually sees and follows your movements. As you play, her eyes will change color letting you know exactly how she's feeling. Bella has touch sensors in her head, ears and cheeks and loves when you pet her. She'll nuzzle in and even respond with affectionate purrs that you can actually feel. After you've discovered Kitty's softer side in Cuddle Mode, get ready for some fun in Play Mode. Bella sings, dances and performs secret tricks. You can tease her with her interactive Kitty Toy and watch her go cat-nip crazy. But don't forget to give her attention or Kitty will wander off and go on her own adventures. Zoomer Kitty is curious, cuddly and loves to perform tricks. Adopt the Kitty that's full of life with Zoomer Kitty Bella, your PURRfect friend.
feature_bullets: Meet Zoomer Kitty – She’s full of PURRsonality
She Plays Just like a real kitty – Bella loves to play
Includes 1 Zoomer Kitty, 1 Kitty Toy, USB charging cable and instruction guide
Includes 1 Zoomer Kitty, 1 Kitty Toy, USB charging cable and instruction guide
